daily_plan_req: Maria Lopez spends at least 6 hours a day Twitch streaming or gaming.
name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a student at Oak Hill College studying physics and a part time Twitch game streamer who loves to connect with people and explore new ideas.
currently: Maria Lopez is working on her physics degree and streaming games on Twitch to make some extra money. She visits Hobbs Cafe for studying and eating just about everyday.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 10am, eats dinner around 7pm.
living_area: the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:Maria Lopez's room
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 10:00 am
have a quick breakfast at 10:30 am
study physics at Oak Hill College from 11:00 am to 2:00 pm
have lunch at Hobbs Cafe at 2:30 pm
Twitch stream gaming from 3:00 pm to 7:00 pm
